changeSet.author: CONNECT_APP
changeSet.sql: DECLARE @SETTING_KEY nvarchar(100) = N'disabled_brand_priority_availability' INSERT INTO dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS (COLLECTION_ID, SETTING_KEY, SETTING_VALUE) SELECT oc.ID, @SETTING_KEY, N'true' FROM ORGANISATION_COLLECTION oc WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS ocs WHERE ocs.COLLECTION_ID = oc.ID AND ocs.SETTING_KEY = @SETTING_KEY)
